ext.title: Simple Runner
ext.description: Provides a button on editor title to run file and codelens 'Copy' and 'Run' for markdown code block.
config.showDebugInfo:
Show debug infomation in ouput channel.  
When enabled:
```log
[info] [PID:123456] Running: chmod +x "/tmp/hello.sh" && "/tmp/hello.sh"
Hello World
[info] [PID:123456] Exited with code: 0
```
When disabled:
```log
Hello World
```
config.showTimestampInDebugInfo:
Show timestamp in debug infomation.  
When enabled:
```log
2024-09-15 18:54:44.356 [info] [PID:123456] Exited with code: 0
```
When disabled:
```log
[info] [PID:123456] Exited with code: 0
```
config.showElapsedTimeInDebugInfo:
Show elapsed time in debug infomation.  
When enabled:
```log
[info] [PID:123456] Exited with code: 0 in 00.01 ms
```
When disabled:
```log
[info] [PID:123456] Exited with code: 0
```
config.runnerMap:
Runner Map by Language  
The following predefined variables are supported:

- **${file}** - the current opened file
- **${fileBasename}** - the current opened file's basename
- **${fileBasenameNoExtension}** - the current opened file's basename with no file extension
- **${fileExtname}** - the current opened file's extension
- **${fileDirname}** - the current opened file's folder path
- **${fileDirnameBasename}** - the current opened file's folder name
- **${pathSeparator}** - the character used by the operating system to separate components in file paths
- **${extTmpDir}** - the extension temporay folder
